name: Mt. Apricot
description:
"Mt. Apricot is facing its greatest challenge yet!

As mysterious goo is taking hold of the entire floating archipelago, it's up to our hero, Blueberry, to cleanse his home from the hazardous corruption"

Features

  • Play as the owl, blueberry, who is able to jump, double jump and glide his way across his corrupted home!
  • Parkour your way on top of corrupted, pink objects to cleanse those and fill your cleanse meter up by doing this!
  • Watch out: purple, spikey corruption is too dens to cleanse and will hurt you when coming in contact with it!
  • Cleanse enough to open the gates and continue to the next few floating islands of Mt. Apricot!
  • Beams shoot out from cleansable corruption for easy tracking!
  • Cleanse 100% and see the island restoring itself to its former glory!

International Game Architecture and Design at Breda University of Applied Sciences.
